about.description:
Proglog is a progress logging system for Python. It allows to build
complex libraries while giving your users control over logs, callbacks
and progress bars.
about.summary: Logs and progress bars manager for Python

about.description:
Proglog is a progress logging system for Python. It allows to build
complex libraries while giving your users control over logs, callbacks
and progress bars.
about.summary: Logs and progress bars manager for Python

name: proglog
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "proglog" %}
{% set version = "0.1.9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d8c4ccbf2138e0c5e3f3fc0d80dc51d7e69dcfe8bfde4cacb566725092a5b18d

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - tqdm

test:
  imports:
    - proglog

about:
  home: https://github.com/Edinburgh-Genome-Foundry/Proglog
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENCE.txt
  summary: 'Logs and progress bars manager for Python'

  description: |
    Proglog is a progress logging system for Python. It allows to build
    complex libraries while giving your users control over logs, callbacks
    and progress bars.
  dev_url: https://github.com/Edinburgh-Genome-Foundry/Proglog

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mdraw
